SET(SHA1_LIB sha1 CACHE INTERNAL "SHA1 Lib")
SET(SPARSEHASH_LIB sparsehash CACHE INTERNAL "Sparsehash Lib")

add_custom_target(${SHA1_LIB}
	COMMAND make
	WORKING_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sha1/"
)

add_custom_target(${SPARSEHASH_LIB}
	COMMAND configure
	COMMAND make
	WORKING_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparsehash"
)

SET(SHA1_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sha1/ CACHE INTERNAL "SHA1 Include")
SET(SPARSEHASH_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparsehash/src ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparsehash/src/windows CACHE INTERNAL "sparsehash Include")
SET(GSSW_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/gssw/src CACHE INTERNAL "gssw Include")
SET(GCSA_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/gcsa2 CACHE INTERNAL "gcsa Include")
SET(ROCKSDB_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rocksdb/include/ CACHE INTERNAL "rocksdb Include")
SET(SDSL_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sdsl-lite/include/ CACHE INTERNAL "sdsl Include")
SET(VCFLIB_INCLUDE_DIR
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vcflib/src/
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vcflib/smithwaterman/
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vcflib/multichoose
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vcflib/tabixpp/
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vcflib/filevercmp
		CACHE INTERNAL "vcflib Include"
)
SET(HTSLIB_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/htslib CACHE INTERNAL "htslib Include")
SET(FASTAHACK_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/fastahack CACHE INTERNAL "fastahack Include")
SET(PROGRESSBAR_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/progress_bar CACHE INTERNAL "progress_bar Include")
SET(LRUCACHE_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lru_cache CACHE INTERNAL "lru_cache Include")
SET(XG_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/xg/src CACHE INTERNAL "xg Include")
